title: Our Thing with Sammy The Bull - S1 Episode 3: The Colombo Family
description:
Salvatore "Sammy the Bull" Gravano (born March 12, 1945) is an American gangster who became the underboss of the Gambino crime family. This is his story. Directed by James Carroll. Original Score and Sound Design by Angelo Palazzo.

Sammy is asked to become an associate for the Colombo family.
